comments:
I tried to generate AjDoc for the Spacewar Example project as described in manual test AJDOC_1. It failed with a NoClassDefFoundError in the console (shown below).  Broken on both 1.2.1 and 1.3.0.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/aspectj/util/FileUtil
	at org.aspectj.tools.ajdoc.Main.parseArgs(Main.java:586)
	at org.aspectj.tools.ajdoc.Main.parseCommandLine(Main.java:420)
	at org.aspectj.tools.ajdoc.Main.main(Main.java:98)

Fixed on 1.2.1:
BUILD COMPLETE -  build.590
Date of build: 11/28/2005 15:26:13
Time to build: 41 minutes 32 seconds
Last changed: 11/28/2005 14:42:09
Last log entry: 117327: Problem with markers for aspects in .java files

and 1.3.0:
BUILD COMPLETE -  build.30
Date of build:	11/28/2005 10:24:44
Time to build:	15 minutes 19 seconds
Last changed:	11/28/2005 09:38:15
Last log entry:	117327: Marker problem for aspects in .java files

The new aspectjweaver.jar wasn't being added to the classpath when launching ajdoc.
